---
title: "Lesson 2 - branching & merging"
format: html
---

1. Create a branch called `favorite-foods` git checkout -b favorite-foods
2. Add a file called `favorite-foods.md`   touch 
3. List 3 of your favorite foods          
4. Save the file and commit to your branch.   git commit 
5. Switch to the `main` branch and merge your `favorite-foods` branch.  git checkout main
6 git merge favorite-foods
